channel.title: How does the source know the model id for custom items?
channel.description: okay lets say i make a custom item, well i give the new item a id or ModelID number. well how does the client send that number to the source and not only the model id number but also the information with that number?

item.title: How does the source know the model id for custom items?

okay lets say i make a custom item, well i give the new item a id or ModelID number.
well how does the client send that number to the source and not only the model id number but also the information with that number?
